title: Information Search and Knowledge Generation Strategies for Online Learning Design System Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment focusing on smartphone-based online learning tools. Learners develop practical knowledge generation skills through experiences in designing job-linked social sector content

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more information search strategies in an online learning design system.
Learners can design one or more pieces of content that integrates digital and analog resources for knowledge generation related to social issues.
Learners can improve the knowledge generation process two or more times using peer feedback and social networks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
